welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sutton Coldfield, where historic charm meets modern flair. Known for its picturesque parks and vibrant shopping and dining scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves as the base for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport is primarily used for charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 4 hours.
